goals.name: Abolition of the State

subGoals.title: Pure free market anarcho-capitalist, voluntarist society
Develop voluntary free market alternatives to ALL monopoly government services
Methods: honest, ethical, high integrity ‚Äî no shortcuts
Decentralized AI inference (Morpheus/Based AI) ‚Äî replaces centralized AI gatekeepers
Onchain property rights (celestial land registry) ‚Äî replaces state-issued titles
Smart contracts replacing legal system functions

actionsTaken: 2026-02-11: Saved Balaji Srinivasan insight on Network State + human value in AI age
actionsSuggested: 2026-02-12: **Nuclear power / SMR opportunity** ‚Äî AIER article on free market nuclear approach, $40B DOE loan authority expiring Sept 2026. Suggested: draft "Johnston's Law and the SMR" article; research zero-government nuclear infrastructure (private insurance pools, competing safety certifiers, contractual liability frameworks). This is a Johnston's Law application to the most "government-essential" service.
context: Early contributor to Decentralized Applications (dApps) framework adopted by Ethereum
Developer of the Smart Agents framework
Created Omni Protocol (originally Mastercoin Protocol) ‚Äî led to USDT stablecoin
Coined "Johnston's Law" (2014): "Everything That Can Be Decentralized Will Be Decentralized"

goals.name: Great Commission & Family
actionsTaken: 2026-02-11: Saved Balaji education framework for guiding children's skill development
2026-02-15: Noted WHOOP fitness integration plans and family AI hub (individual agents per family member)

goals.name: Space Settlement

subGoals.title: Celestial property ownership system on Base (Ethereum L2) ‚Äî lunar land registry / futures market
Lockean homesteading model: first to mix labor with nature claims ownership
Smart contract marketplace for bidders to lock capital
Verification via onchain robot/human identifiers + satellite mapping
Legal basis: U.S. SPACE Act of 2015

actionsSuggested: (2026-02-23) Draft "Lunar Property Rights Framework" whitepaper (2-3 pages) positioning celestial registry as neutral infrastructure for the emerging lunar economy ‚Äî shareable with SpaceX, NASA, Firefly

(2026-02-23) Reach out to Phillip at SpaceX to schedule call about registry-Starship lunar partnership, framing as helping SpaceX establish property rights infrastructure before Blue Origin or others do
context: SpaceX VIP, in contact with Phillip re: Starship seats/payloads
Early investor in Space Fund (space tech venture fund)
Helped fund Firefly Aerospace (Cedar Park, TX)
Knows Tim Dodd ("Everyday Astronaut"), attends Astro Awards
Supporter of New Worlds & Space Cowboy Ball (Austin, TX)

goals.name: Wealth Creation

subGoals.title: **Morpheus AI (mor.org):** Open source contributor and GitHub maintainer, owns MOR tokens
**Based AI:** Strategy role ‚Äî commercial layer for distributed inference
**Everclaw:** OpenClaw skill for self-sovereign decentralized inference via Morpheus
**Johnston's Law:** "Everything That Can Be Decentralized Will Be Decentralized"

actionsTaken: 2026-02-10: Drafted user persona v1 (pre-meeting), sent to David
2026-02-10: Prepared meeting notes with x402/ERC-8004 context
actionsSuggested: 2026-02-10: Draft "Private AI Inference" positioning brief for Based AI
2026-02-10: Propose "Agent-Ready Sessions" as Morpheus governance initiative
2026-02-17: Write "Distributed AI Inference: Centralized vs Decentralized" competitive analysis ‚Äî Equinix/Groq vs Morpheus/Based AI positioning for enterprise sales + March 1 GA launch

2026-02-24: Draft "Morpheus x402 Interoperability Proposal" ‚Äî governance proposal for x402/ERC-8004 bridge to MOR API billing, enabling agent-economy demand flywheel ahead of March 1 GA. Share with Kyle, Thomas B., governance community by Friday.

2026-02-24: Write "Morpheus MCP Server Integration Brief" ‚Äî technical proposal for exposing Morpheus inference endpoints as MCP-compatible servers with native x402 payment. Cloudflare Agent SDK + MCP + x402 ecosystem is exploding (Stripe on Base, XRP Ledger facilitator, Coinbase/AWS/Anthropic partnerships). Making Morpheus discoverable by any MCP-enabled agent creates automatic demand. Draft by Thursday, share with Kyle and Thomas B. for March 1 GA positioning.

2026-02-24: Draft "Sovereign AI Agent Stack" reference architecture one-pager ‚Äî maps Morpheus (inference) + Based AI (enterprise commercial layer) + OpenClaw (agent framework) + MOR (payment rail) into a complete self-sovereign AI stack. CoinDesk (Feb 22) already named Morpheus, Venice.AI, and OpenClaw together in "How Decentralized AI is Leveling the Playing Field" ‚Äî capitalize on this organic media placement with a formal architecture doc. Target: enterprise buyers who need autonomy + governance + accountability (per Gartner/Cloud Wars Feb 2026 reports). Use as March 1 GA launch collateral and Based AI partnership asset. Draft by Thursday, share with Brian Bourgerie (enterprise sales) and Based AI team (Teana, Thomas B.).

2026-02-24 (v2): Draft "The Decentralized Counter to Frontier Alliances" ‚Äî enterprise sales battle card. OpenAI announced "Frontier Alliances" (Feb 23) partnering with 4 major consulting firms for enterprise push. Create 2-page battle card + objection handler positioning Morpheus + Based AI as sovereignty alternative. Key angles: vendor lock-in risk, audit transparency, fiduciary agent requirements, x402 ecosystem momentum (Xyber on Base, XRP Ledger facilitator both launched same week). Target: Brian Bourgerie for immediate use in pipeline calls ahead of March 1 GA. Also addresses BeInCrypto-identified narrative gap between AI hype and crypto AI token performance. Share with Based AI team (Teana, Thomas B.) by Thursday.

keyFacts.heading: üìã Release Process ‚Äî CRITICAL
keyFacts.content:
When pushing a new named version to `profbernardoj/everclaw`:
1. Push to `profbernardoj/everclaw` (main)
2. Push to all 28+ flavor repos (batch script)
3. Open PR from `profbernardoj` ‚Üí `EverClaw/everclaw` org repo
4. David merges the org PR
